solution_line_template: They played {total_rounds} rounds and William won {william_more_wins} more rounds than Harry so that leaves {total_rounds} - {william_more_wins} = <<{total_rounds}-{william_more_wins}={remaining_rounds}>>{remaining_rounds} round
There are {num_players} players and {remaining_rounds} rounds so they each won {remaining_rounds}/{num_players} = {rounds_per_player_equal_share} rounds

William won {william_more_wins} more rounds than Harry and they each won {rounds_per_player_equal_share} rounds so William won {rounds_per_player_equal_share}+{william_more_wins} = <<{rounds_per_player_equal_share}+{william_more_wins}={william_wins}>>{william_wins} rounds
